gen:link.msg:message: `ConstructionContractsAmount` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ConstructionContractsAmount')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ConstructionContractsAmount return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfConstructionContractsAmountDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfConstructionContractsAmountDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfConstructionContractsAmountCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConstructionContractsOtherAmountsBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfConstructionContractsAmountCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
